phobic_conditions.impulse_phobia_intrusion: impulse phobia with mental intrusions and fear of being dangerous
phobic_conditions.symbolic_entrapment: agoraphobia with symbolic entrapment, maternal overcontrol
phobic_conditions.postpartum_panic: panic disorder with postpartum hypervigilance and traumatic anchoring
phobic_conditions.death_medical_phobia: fear of death or medical situations with personal medical history
